Package se.arkalix.net.http.client

Interface HttpClientConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpConnection
    public interface HttpClientConnection
extends HttpConnection
    Represents an HTTP connection established between a local HttpClient and some remote HTTP server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Future<HttpClientResponse> send​(HttpClientRequest request)
      Sends given request to connected remote host.
      Future<HttpClientResponse> sendAndClose​(HttpClientRequest request)
      Sends given request to connected remote host and then closes the connection after the response has either been received or an exception prevents it from being received.

      • Methods inherited from interface se.arkalix.net.http.HttpConnection

        close, isLive, isSecure, localCertificateChain, localSocketAddress, remoteCertificateChain, remoteSocketAddress

    • Method Detail

      • send

        Future<HttpClientResponse> send​(HttpClientRequest request)
        Sends given request to connected remote host.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request to send.
        Returns:
        Future eventually completed with response or exception.

      • sendAndClose

        Future<HttpClientResponse> sendAndClose​(HttpClientRequest request)
        Sends given request to connected remote host and then closes the connection after the response has either been received or an exception prevents it from being received.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request to send.
        Returns:
        Future eventually completed with response or exception.
